name: CRUSH THEM ALL (notGDCjam2019)
description:
AGAIN A CLASSIC ALIENS ATTACK !

"The GDC was attacked by evils aliens ! Luckily you are there to rescue the game developper !"

Catch the PAC-GUM and use the inflatable PACMAN to :

CRUSH THEM ALL !
Play with [left] and {right] arrow to move and use [space] to jump.

You can download windows version (for best performance) here :
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1coU-8VlZ7Xw41-6I9o_OscISnqqgfLAl

This is a Minimalist Graphics Action Game made for notGDCJam 2019.

Engine used : Game Maker Studio 1.4.
Software used : Paint.net, Audacity.
